string.text: You're a weakling, Swordsman, you're useless. So you won't get any thanks from us. There's nothing to thank you for.
Not bad, stalker, shooting mutants. But you're not very quick, so if you want to pass, you'll have to pay.
Well done, Swordsman, you really helped us a lot. We'll consider you paid for your pass. You can go to the bar.
Let's get them close so no one gets away. I shoot first, then you.
Stalker, you are in the territory controlled by the Debt. Any display of aggression will be punished.
All hail!!! This is Duty outpost at the junkyard. There's a wave of mutants coming from the Dark Valley towards the Bar. Anybody who can help us shoot the beast off, we guarantee our gratitude.
Stalker, you're in Duty territory. If you get violent, you'll get the 4th degree of disability!
Good job, guys, we beat them. I'm going to rest, and you, stalker, come over here and talk to me.
Folks, this is Neutral Squad Leader calling. We knocked the bandits out of an abandoned vehicle park, and we're expecting a counterattack. We don't have much manpower, so you're welcome to help.
